item.description:
OUR FIRST SALSA MEETUP EVENT!

Join us July 30th on Boston's hottest salsa dance cruises through SalsaBoston.com! This is your chance to meet other Salsaholics or newbies on the meetup board, hang out with friends, and dance outdoors under the Boston sky! Get ready for the salsa get together of the summer!

The regular price is $17.50 per person through SalsaBoston, $22 at the door, or........


AN UNBELIEVABLE DEAL OF ONLY $15, ONLY THROUGH THE SALSA MEETUP GROUP!


*** Pay Today With Paypal - $15.70 (includes paypal fees)
*** Want to take the lesson? Just enter $17.70 in paypal
*** Contact Ana to pay $15 by cash/check

RSVP TODAY!


The schedule:

6:00 pm: Preparty starts dockside at "The Landing" on Long Wharf....Mix and mingle with other Boston/Cambridge Meetup members!

6:30-7:30: If you're just getting into salsa and want to learn a few steps before getting on the ship, we highly recommend the Beginner Dockside Salsa Lesson at "The Landing" with Johnny and Kelly (Gate 2). (Add Only $2 per person for the dockside lesson)

7:30 pm: Boarding begins, latin buffet and cash bar on board. (Dinner only $10 more)

7:45 pm: The Ship Departs! SALSA TIME!

Thru 10pm: 2 decks of dancing! Salsa with DJ D. Martinez, and Latin Mix with DJ Mike Mercado


Bring your friends, even non salsa dancers can have a great time with the Latin mix party downstairs!

Look forward to seeing you guys there!

Ana T., Anara, and Ana B.

Need more information about the cruise or other cruise dates?

http://salsaboston.co...

For more information, see http://salsaboston.co...

group.name: The Boston & Cambridge Salsa Meetup Group

item.name: July Salsa Cruise Meetup!
